item.title: Chassis and Drive Train
item.description: The body and drive train of the Robot will determine if our project is going to actually function in the real world. It all starts with a design in mind, choices of materials, the design of all functional components, mobility, motion and durability of the project.

item.title: Requirements ~ The Controller

item.title: Mobile Robot I/O Project
item.description: Building a useful Robot is hard, in large part because Robotics is an inter-disciplinary subject matter requiring a high level of mastery of a number of complex subjects, (some of which we have listed below).

item.title: Mobile Robot I/O Projects
item.description: The Mobile Robot I/O Project is more than a single project, really it is a group of projects related to building, running and maintaining a mobile robot.
